messages.title: The Lib Dem difference
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will stand up for local NHS services. We will put more police on patrol, restore the pensions' earnings link and deliver fair pay for the armed forces.

messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will stand up for local NHS services.
We will put more police on patrol.
Deliver fair pay for the armed forces.
The Lib Dems are the only party with a plan to balance the country's books after the recession.

issues.economy: Balance the country's books after the recession.
issues.education: Wants a fair deal for schools, students, families, and pensioners.
issues.health: The Liberal Democrats will stand up for local NHS services.

housing.content: Public funding faces the big squeeze if Labour win election

leaflet.personalStatement: Asghar Ali is self employed and a Cardiff City councillor. He is married with four children. He wants a fair deal for schools, students, families, and pensioners.

politicalExperience.role: Executive Member of the Race Equality Council

quotes.text: Public funding faces the big squeeze if Labour win election

images.caption: Asghar Ali with two men in front of a building.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet criticizes Gordon Brown for his record of shame, mentioning the Iraq War, taxes on the lower paid, closing thousands of local post offices, and dithering over taking action on MPs' expenses.
